channel.title: [Source][VB] SendKeysHuman
channel.description:
[code]Sub SendKeysHuman(Text As String) Dim a As Long For a = 1 To Len(Text) SendKeys Mid(Text, a, 1) Wait 150 + Random(200) DoEvents Next a End Sub[/code]
(Needs the "Random" Function: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,1290.0.html) (Needs the "Wait" Function: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,1309.0.html)

item.title: [Source][VB] SendKeysHuman
item.dc:creator: @Freddy1990 Freddy1990
item.description:
@Freddy1990 wrote:

Sub SendKeysHuman(Text As String)
Dim a As Long
    For a = 1 To Len(Text)
        SendKeys Mid(Text, a, 1)
        Wait 150 + Random(200)
        DoEvents
    Next a
End Sub

(Needs the "Random" Function: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,1290.0.html)
(Needs the "Wait" Function: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,1309.0.html)

Read full topic
